content: Our project is the launch of MLM-strategy in Asia, Vietnam, India and Africa. We are looking for experienced professionals who know how to organize people and make money.We are a large ecosystem with many useful features. Our main bias is privacy. We have a unique browser and messenger with the best encryption system! We have our own content creation platform. And many other things that set us apart from other projects!What we need:- promotion of our messenger- Explaining the essence of the product- scaling the promotion- audience gathering- reporting- Attending conferences and all cryptocurrency related events in your region.Experience working with cryptocurrency-oriented audiences is a must.If you are located in Asia, India, Vietnam and Africa and think you would be a good fit for this position, please post your experience in this thread and leave your contacts. (this is the preferred method)You can also message me on Telegram @JoBraver

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: seems legit/sI don't think you'll find what you are looking for here, and I think that you should reconsider the business idea (whether you are a founder or an employee) before you go ahead...to prevent any complications that could arise later.Privacy and encryption are not only things that are traditionally open source and free, but they are things that can be broken. I definitely wouldn't trust an MLM to maintain or protect my privacy, or uphold quality/true encryption.Feel free to counter anything I have said, as I'm interested as to whether or not the company is an outright scam or if there is actually some form of innovation behind this idea. I doubt it based on the OP.
